item.title: About
item.description: ⭐ Chess Player @ lichess.org and Chess.com ⭐ Senior Software Engineer @ XYZ Teknoloji ⭐ Develops C# and JS and also interests Go Skills I’ve experienced: → Architectural Design, Design Patterns → Tiered Arch., MVC, MVVM, Microservices → OOP, SOLID, TDD, DDD, SOA, ABC, XYZ and any other abbreviations… → Scrum, Kanban, Pair Programming, Code Review → C#, JS, Go → MySQL, MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, CosmosDB → Azure, AWS, Google Cloud

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello there, this is Ozan and this is next one of my numerous blogging trials. Hopefully, this time I keep continue to blogging. Content of this blog will be mostly about programming but still I do not guarantee that I won’t write on different topics. Until I see you all soon, keep digging!
